snippets.name: Media - Add/Update Image Sizes
snippets.desc: A snippet that allows you to programmatically add or rewrite image sizes generated by WordPress, themes, and plugins. Great for reconfiguring image sizes that do not fit your website requirements (too large, too small, cropping, un-cropping, adding new sizes, etc.). For default WordPress image sizes, it's recommended that you use the options available in your Dashboard > Settings > Media. But if you want you can still point them or other image sizes to these settings in order to use them to change sizes that you can't remove but want to stop WordPress from generating more files. Remember to Regenerate Thumbnails after activating this snippet. A great plugin that does this is the reGenerate Thumbnails Advanced.
